meta.article_title: July 14, 2014 - The 7 Habits of Highly Effective Table Tennis Players

loves_to_practice_7_habits_of_highly_eff.probleme: Wants to improve table tennis skills

debutant.description: Wanting to practice and being proactive in finding ways to improve, strategically and tactically.

intermediaire.description: Strategic thinking is about developing your game for the future. Tactical thinking is about developing the habit of winning with what you have.

avance.description: Respect opponent's game while looking to dominate it. If you don't respect an opponent's game, it's hard to try your best against it.

exercices_complementaires.description: Wanting to practice and being proactive in finding ways to improve, strategically and tactically.
